name: ASMRDreams
0:
”Alexa, open asmr dreams”
”Alexa, ask asmr dreams to play tapping sounds”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: a. s. m. r. dreams
des:
ASMR Dreams plays relaxing ASMR audio to help you go to sleep. 

(Wearing Headphones/Earphones is recommended for the ultimate experience)

HOW TO USE:

When you say Open ASMR Dreams, you can decide which trigger you want to listen to.

If you already have a trigger in mind you can play it straight away by saying:
Alexa, Ask ASMR Dreams to play tapping sounds

If you want to play any trigger:
Alexa, Ask ASMR Dreams to play

If you need to know what triggers are available:
Alexa, what triggers are there?
Alexa, tell me the triggers available.


STANDARD TRIGGERS:

- Tapping
- Brushing
- Scratching
- Drawing
- Hand Sounds

PREMIUM TRIGGERS:
Includes all the standard triggers as well as:

- Random Triggers
- Head Massage
- Crinkling
- Hair Cut

If you want more triggers you can with the Premium Subscription. We will be adding more ASMR content.

Premium Subscription Features:
More triggers
New content 
Loop content


REQUESTS:

We will be adding new content for the premium subscription but if you want a trigger sound that is not yet available, don't hesitate to leave feedback to let us know which sounds you want to feature on ASMR Dreams next.

If you like ASMR Dreams a review would be much appreciated to support us.

Other skills you can try out from Adassa Innovations are:

Riddle Time - See if you are the ultimate riddle master! 
Horse Race - Try your luck at Horse Race and see if you can pick the winning horses.
Beat the Clock - You have 30 seconds to write down as many words in a random category.
Music Bop Adventures - Our very popular kids skill allows children to unlock their imagination on a variety of adventures. Go into Space, Under the Sea and more!
